metadata.title: CVE-2020-24978 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In NASM 2.15.04rc3, there is a double-free vulnerability in pp_tokline asm/preproc.c. This is fixed in commit 8806c3ca007b84accac21dd88b900fb03614ceb7.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-24978` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.15.04-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.04-1').
